title: Ensembl genome database project
summary: Ensembl genome database project is a scientific project at the European Bioinformatics Institute, which was launched in 1999 in response to the imminent completion of the Human Genome Project.[2] Ensembl aims to provide a centralized resource for geneticists, molecular biologists and other researchers studying the genomes of our own species and other vertebrates and model organisms.[3]  Ensembl is one of several well known genome browsers for the retrieval of genomic information.
